---Shipping---
Items are shipped by regular mail.  We ship orders 1-2 business days from receipt of order.

Typical shipping times are listed below.  Please note that there is no tracking for regular mail.  Delays can happen that may extend the delivery time.  Using regular mail allows us to keep the cost low for you!

USA: 4-7 business days typically (please allow 9 business days before contacting me)

results.title: LIVE LAUGH LOVE Pink Butterfly Floral Light Switch Cover Plate or Outlet   Home  Decor  Free Shipping in U.S.!!!
results.description:
Decorative Light Switch Covers 
                                           No More Boring Switch and Outlet Covers!

                                          I decorate each cover using custom printed decals.
                                         Each has a vinyl protective layer over image area.
                                                     Can be cleaned with a damp cloth. 
                                                             They make great gifts

PLEASE NOTE EACH PLATE HAS A CODE NUMBER PLEASE REFER TOO LAST PICTURE  SHOWN IN WHITE AND NUMBERED.
TO BE SURE YOU ARE GETTING THE PLATE YOU NEED. IF BUYING A COMBINATION PLATE BE SURE TO PICK THE CORRECT LIGHT / OUTLET PLACEMENT.

I use standard size plates I offer these sizes. 
I use levington Plastic Covers 
single size are: 2.75" w  x 4.5" h
double sizes are 4.5" x 4.5"
Triple sizes are 4.5" h x 6.6 3/8" w
Quad sizes are: 4.5" h x 8 1/8" w
All plates are white so will have a white edge. 
This way It doesn't compete with your wall color.
                 
          
 Please note any plain white plates will be decorated in the design shown for listing. 
                                          Each GFIC or Rocker Style Cover I will include the cut out. 
                              So you can use it on a switch if you want to. ( self stick cut out)
                                                           Screws are painted to match.
                               Please note not all screw hole are always cut due to picture placement.
                                 They will still Secure  to wall with the amount of screws I send.

            I can do many other sizes and style plates. 
Please contact me to see if I can do the plate you need.

                                             Please if you have question feel free to ask.

                                                                  Thank you for stopping in
                                                                       Have a Great Day!!
I charge a 20% restocking on returned items.

results.title: Pressed Flower Bookmark - "Live, Love, Laugh", Pink & Yellow Floral Bookmark, Bookmarks With Flowers, Pretty Bookmark, Gifts For Me
results.description:
This pressed flower bookmark with a "Live, Love, Laugh" quote is made with real flowers!  The bookmark is made with pink chrysanthemum and white nigela set below the quote.  The flowers have been thoroughly dried & pressed prior to making the bookmark.  Then they are carefully arranged & laminated which protects the flowers and keeps the colors bright & beautiful for years to come.  Because of this lamination process, the bookmark is also very sturdy and will hold up well with daily use.  Each bookmark measures approximately 6" X 2" and there is a matching ribbon extending about 5 inches.  The bookmark arrives gift ready in a clear plastic sleeve sealed with a clear sticker on the back.   While no two bookmarks will look exactly alike, each one will follow the same color & design as shown in the photographs.  Since each flower is unique in nature, the sizes of each one can also vary a little.   I can also make custom bookmarks with any color or custom text desired in quantities of 10 or more at a discount depending on the quantity desired.  After 50 bookmarks, the price is $3.00 per bookmark.  Please message me with your questions or price quotes.

Item#  20925

results.title: FRAmE PRiMiTiVE STiTCHERY "LIVE WiTH FAiTH LAUGH WiTH FRiENDS LOVE WiTH FAMiLY" CoUNTRY FARmHoUSE RuSTiC INSPiRIiNG UPLiFTiNG WELCOMiNG GiFT
results.description:
This handmade Primitive Stitchery was done freehand, in the hills of Appalachia, so no two are exactly alike.

'LIVE WITH FAITH. LAUGH WITH FRIENDS. LOVE WITH FAMILY." was stitched on tea stained muslin then placed in handmade rough cut frame with an easel back and distressed black finish.  It measures approximately 5x7 inches.

I crafted this piece in a smoke free/pet free home.

Thank you for viewing, I hope you will consider adding this piece to your home or as a gift.

Let me invite you to stop by my shop as I continue to add new 'old' things.

Blessings
Karen Rae

results.title: Live Right ~ Ride Hard ~ Roll in the Hay - Horse Riding - Repurposed Barnwood Sign
results.description:
This is a Sign made from Repurposed Barn Wood.  The lettering is Hand Airbrushed and features repurposed harness leather for hanging the sign.  Though we make more than one of each sign, each sign is unique depending on the characteristics of the wood and leather.  Each sign is not exactly the same...but that is what makes them so COOL!  Please indicate your design preference by sending us a Convo or include a message with your order.  We will send you a photo to make sure you like your sign before shipping or send you several options to choose from. If you need a certain size, please also specify this.  This sign can also be hung with a horse hames for $25, see other listing.

We also offer custom Barn Wood Signs...featuring Custom Sayings, Custom Names or Custom Decor...We Love New Ideas...Just ASK!!!

Shipping varies depending on your location and the actual weight of the item.  If there is a variance in shipping, we are happy to refund the difference!

results.title: Maple Wood Woodburned Live Laugh Love Jewelry Box, Keepsake Box, Memory Box. Woodburned Box, Pyrography Box,
results.description:
Solid maple wood jewelry or keepsake box featuring "Live, Laugh, Love" woodburned into the top. The hinges and latch are antique brass.  This box measures 5"x 5"x 3" and is lined in a soft, rich black which makes it perfect keeping all of your treasures safe.

As with all of my boxes, each design is burned into the wood by hand, never with the use of a laser or CNC automation, which means each box is unique and one of a kind. It is my goal to provide you with something you will use and enjoy for years to come, so each item is sealed and finished to help keep it protected and beautiful over time.


Please feel free to contact me with any questions or to get information on creating a custom order!


You can view all of the items in my store with this link: https://www.etsy.com/shop/willowswitchdesigns

You can also find me on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/WillowSwitchDesigns

results.title: Leather bracelet "live" "love" "laugh" - personalized with 3 sliding beads - bracelet gift - favorite person
results.description:
Exclusive genuine leather bracelet with 3 motif beads "live" "love" "laugh"

This great bracelet comes to you on request in a very personal gift case. The names in the inlay are of course just as individually selectable as with the sliding elements.

° ° ° ° °

Item features bracelet blue:

- 43 cm x 8 mm for a wrist circumference of 15 - 18 cm
- Genuine leather, silver-plated metal, glass, photo paper
- handmade
- Ball cap screwed, 4-fold adjustable
- Motif bead "live"
- Motif bead "love"
- Motif bead "laugh"

° ° ° ° °

Your perfect gift for every occasion - personal and individual. Since we manufacture this item for you, shipping may take 1-2 business days longer.

Exclusive bracelet in Italian genuine leather with the dimensions of 43 cm x 8 mm. It is worn double-wrapped and is adjustable in size 4 times. Thus, it is suitable for almost every wrist. The closure is screwed so that, if necessary, the bracelet can also be shortened itself. However, this will only be necessary if the circumference of the wrist is less than 14 cm. The leather strap is well suited with a wrist of 15 - 18 cm circumference.

The sliding beads are silver-plated and can be easily pushed and replaced by the leather, so that a new look is always created.

We are happy to deliver additional pearls according to your wishes.

I will make the motif beads in color and text according to your wishes. Just share your desired text in the personalization request form.

For photo motifs, send me a desired photo to the following email address: info@maya-und-elli.de

Please note that the photo is of good quality and that the motif is in the middle and not filling the picture.

° ° ° ° °

Care note: Please do not expose your bracelet and sliding elements to water or cosmetics/cleaning agents, as the beads and prints are NOT waterproof!

° ° ° ° °

Depending on the monitor setting, the colors of the product images can be displayed in falsified and differ from the original. Individually made pieces of jewellery are excluded from exchange.

Our offers are unused new goods. All mentioned brand names and article images are protected by copyright, are used only because they are part of the offer and may not be used without consent.

We ship insured by Hermes. If you buy several items to save on shipping costs, please request the total amount before paying. We will adjust the invoice manually so that you do not have to pay the shipping costs several times. We ask for your understanding that we will not be able to refund overpaid shipping costs afterwards.

results.title: Beautifully hand crafted 3 dimensional Intarsia Wood Art OWL & BABY Picture Photo Frame
results.description:
Beautifully hand-crafted 3-dimensional Intarsia OWL & BABY Wood Picture Photo Frame.

This piece of intarsia wood art required a lot of workmanship since it was hand-carved from 48 different pieces of wood with different thickness and glued together on a wood base to form this Owl & Baby Picture Frame.

Shelf display or wall hanging (the frame has a stand and also a hook on the back). 

All hand-carved using different kinds of wood to bring different colors for the piece. So, the colors of wood here are natural colors of wood. For this feature, it's almost like one-of-a-kind because next time if we make the same design again, it won't look exactly the same as the wood grain will change slightly. Also, each piece is hand-carved individually, so it's all unique. (The actual item you'll receive maybe very slightly different than what pictured since each piece is hand-crafted individually. However, we're confident you'll love the piece you receive regarding beauty and quality. We can confirm this because we have a lot of repeated happy customers).

Semi-gloss finish.

It would add a very beautiful & interesting item to your collection or make a perfect gift idea.....

Overall measurements : approximately 11-1/8" long X 7.75" high X 1" thick.

The frame measures approximately 7-3/8" high X 5.5" wide.

Photo area measures approximately 6" high X 4" wide.


Item # PF-Owl&Baby-1A

Hand crafted by B.Evans

Original Price : $100

Today Price : $49.95 . You save : $50

results.title: Live Laugh Love Plasma Cut Words
results.description:
As layed out in the photo the dimensions are 16 inches by 9 inches . Live and Love are 6.25 inches long and Laugh is 9 inches long.  Cut from 14 Gauge hot rolled steel and had a raw metal finish. Includes all 3 words. there are not mounting holes. You can see I have them resting on screws but the best way is to use two finishing nails, they will blend in with the metal and you wont see them. 

All dimensions are estimated (+/- .25 inches)

Everything we do is hand made. We do lots of custom work. If there is something you are looking for and can’t find, please reach out to us!

We believe manufacturing and creativity belong together. We Operate a welding and machining job shop and we like to put our talents to work making metal art with our spare time. Find our Facebook, Instagram, and Website for more info.

results.title: Live, Laugh, Love Sideways 180 Shadow Book Folding Patterns (Set of 3 Digital Download PATTERNS ONLY)
results.description:
Live, Laugh, Love sideways 180 shadow, SET OF 3 CUT & FOLD PATTERNS.

This is a set of 3 book folding pattern to enable you to fold your own books in the design 
pictured and for you to decorate how you choose.
Permission has been given for the use of any photographs.

This is for mark, CUT & FOLD written patterns NOT for 3 completed book folds

You will need 3 hardback books at 23cm tall 
All 3 books need to be of a similar appearance, and have at least 249 pages

These patterns are 3 PDFs available for instant download.
Includes a free book folding tutorial PDF for both shadow & 180 folds.

All patterns have been tested.

Please do not copy, share or sell these patterns but I do hope you sell lots of books made using it!

Please view my other items.

You can also find me on my Facebook page as Zoë's Novel Creations

Hope you enjoy your folding!

results.title: Blue Wall Art, Navy Home Decor, Live Laugh Love CANVAS, Bathroom Decor, Navy Bedroom Wall Art, Nursery Wall Art, Wall Hangings - HOME197
results.description:
Set of 3 wall art prints featuring inspirational quote "Live, Laugh, Love" with bright navy blue background, perfect decor for bedroom, bathroom, kids room.

Sizing options are available from the drop-down menu. These high quality prints are created digitally and are beautifully printed on Photo Paper or Canvas.

NOW AVAILABLE ON PHOTO PAPER AND CANVAS!!!

***UNFRAMED PRINTS OPTION:
-Printed on Luster Photo Paper for a more professional look. The surface of luster photo paper is also less likely to show fingerprints.
-Frames are NOT included, the prints will ship in flat rigid mailers or mailing tubes depending on the sizes.

***STRETCHED CANVAS OPTION:
-Frame is 1.25" thick and is built with a solid face to prevent loosening and sagging over time.
-Canvas come with finished backing and are ready to hang.


Please note that printed colors may vary from your monitor due to screen resolution and printers.

results.title: Live Laugh Fuck Off, Floral Cross Stitch
results.description:
A sarcastic take on the popular "Live, Laugh, Love" slogan - because no one is happy and perfect all of the time and that's ok!

The pattern can be used for cross stitch embroidery or tapestry, but the downloaded chart is based on DMC 6 stranded thread in 28 colours.

The download includes 3 types of chart - which can be downloaded as either multi-page charts (for printing) or single-page charts (for use on a phone or tablet):

- 2 coloured (with and without symbols) 
- 1 black and white chart 

The download also includes thread requirement estimates and a final piece size guide with examples of fabrics that you may choose to use.

Enjoy!
